version_description: Several stability improvements and bug fixes
Several stability improvements and bug fixes

Stability and performance improvements and bug fixes, including:
1. Improvements to the new camera experience.
2. Improvements to editing your business listing information.

In our latest version, we have refreshed our reviews experience to make it easier to read and reply to customer reviews. We have also worked to improve the stability and performance of the posting experience.
In our latest version, we have added support for Location Groups within the app.
In our latest version, we have made it easier to share your profile and improved the photos experience.
In our latest version, we have resolved some stability and performance issues within the app. Thanks for your continual feedback!
In our latest version, we have fixed several bugs and stability issues thanks to your continual feedback.
In our latest version, we have made it easier to manage the state of your profile.
In our latest version, we have added more insights to help you better understand how users are interacting with your posts.
In our latest version, you can now edit your business description from the app! We are also continually improving the posting experience to make it even easier to connect to your customers.

What’s new with the Google My Business 3.0 app, you ask? A lot. We heard that our app could get better so we got to work making improvements.

- In the new Customers tab you can respond to reviews, message with your customers, and see your followers all in one place.

- Results on the Home tab. Clicks, calls, direction requests, and follows – see in one glance how and how much your customers interact with your Business Profile right from the app’s Home tab.

- Introducing the Business Profile – that helpful box with your business information that you see on Google Search and Maps finally has a name: Business Profile on Google. Make edits to your Business Profile and see those changes on Google in real time.

- With a tap of the new Post button in the app, you can easily upload photos, create enticing offers and share what makes your business so unique.

- Real-time notifications let you know when a customer connects with your business on Google. Focus on what you love and rest easy knowing that Google My Business is on the clock helping you get more customers.

- And finally, we have fixed several bugs and made various other technical improvements to help keep your business running smoothly on Google.
In our latest version we have added support for service business within the app. We have also fixed an issue which caused notifications to not be dismissed when opening the app.

In our latest version we have enriched our notifications experience to include photos within notifications. We have also fixed a number of bugs and stability issues within the product thanks to your continual feedback.
In our latest version we have improved the messaging experience to allow replies to messages straight from notifications within the Notification Center.
In our latest version, we have added more insights to help you better understand how users are interacting with your posts.
In our latest version, we have fixed several bugs and stability issues thanks to your continual feedback.
In our latest version, we have added support for Site Managers within the app.
In our latest version, we have resolved some of stability issues when viewing and removing photos. Thanks for your continual feedback!
In our latest version, we have changed the way you interact with uploaded photos and videos. Thanks for your continual feedback!
In our latest version, we have made it easier to manage the state of your profile.
In our latest version, we have made it easier to share your profile and improved the photos experience.
In our latest version, we have made it even simpler to claim your short name.
In our latest version, we have resolved some stability and performance issues within the app. Thanks for your continual feedback!
In our latest version, we have resolved some stability and performance issues within the app. Thanks for your continual feedback!
In our latest version, we have resolved some stability and performance issues within the app. Thanks for your continual feedback!
In our latest version, we have made it easier to create events, offers, and products and upload photos of your business.
In our latest version, we have added support for Location Groups within the app.
In our latest version, we have fixed several bugs and added insights for messaging.
In our latest version, we have fixed several bugs in the home tab.
In our latest version, we have improved the messaging experience.
In our latest version, we have made general improvements to the experience by fixing bugs.
In our latest version, we have made it easier to share your business profile.
In our latest version, we have improved the messaging experience within the app.
In our latest version, we have improved the overall experience by fixing bugs and stability issues.
In our latest version, you can now create alert updates for your business.
In our latest version, we have fixed a number of stability and performance issues.
In our latest version, we have fixed a number of stability and performance issues.
In our latest version, we have fixed an issue with the number of unread messages being incorrect.
In our latest version, we have improved the reliability of business messaging.
In our latest version, we have let you manage more post types than ever!
In our latest version, we have improved the stability of the app.
In our latest version, we have improved the messaging experience within the app.
In our latest version, we have further improved the messaging experience within the app.
In our latest version, we have improved messaging announcements.
In our latest version, we have improved the messaging experience and stability.
